long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check Ebay item inventory information and notify user when it is available.
————
Update Aug 2020: it’s now working for EBAY.COM
If you need this extensions for another Ebay.domain, please write me via email.
It’s also free of charge.
—————
This extension will check Ebay inventory at most 50 second, to be alerted when one of these items is in stock or available for pre-order or order, make sure to add that item to your account and turn on the corresponding stock status toggles.

This extension also monitors Ebay websites to see when products come in stock or up for pre-order. When the stock available for order, the extension will browser alert.

Related Ebay item ID : 251589582298, 233261637412, 123524339671, 121950607982.
  
To add the items you want alerted on to your account. Set the alert delivery options next to each item. Sit back and wait for alerts to roll in. Act fast to get the item more efficiency, you can save 50 seconds per order.
The extension is free and also stay free.
